results.name: Nonnegative integer solutions X to the equation: X(X + 1) - 10*Y^2 = 0.
comment: Also, numbers n such that 5*A000217(n) is a square. [_Bruno Berselli_, Dec 16 2013]
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (39,-39,1).
